objects.text: • ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLING • 40H PLAYTIME • HI-RES AUDIO

product_details.description: Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling: 2 internal and 2 external mics work in tandem to detect external noise and effectively reduce up to 90% of it, such as planes and car engines. Immerse Yourself in Detailed Audio: The noise cancelling headphones have oversized 40mm dynamic drivers that produce detailed sound and thumping beats with BassUp technology. Compatible with Hi-Res certified audio via the AUX cable for more detail. 40-Hour Long Battery Life and Fast Charging: With 40 hours of battery life with ANC on and 60 hours in normal mode, you can commute in peace with your Bluetooth headphones without thinking about recharging. Fast charge for 5 mins to get an extra 4 hours of playtime. Dual-Connections: Connect to two devices simultaneously with Bluetooth 5.0 and instantly switch between them. Whether you're working on your laptop, or need to take a phone call, audio from your Bluetooth headphones will automatically play from the device you need to hear from. App for EQ Customization: Download the soundcore app to tailor your sound using the customizable EQ, with 22 presets, or adjust it yourself. You can also switch between 3 modes: ANC, Normal, and Transparency, and relax with white noise. Hear Your Surroundings: Switch to Transparency mode on your noise cancelling headphones when you need to be aware of your surroundings, such as transportation announcements, crossing the road, or just staying connected to the world around you. Brand - Soundcore ** Color - White ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 16 Ohm **

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner showcases a modern and tech-savvy aesthetic, ideal for marketing premium audio gear. At the center is a high-quality product image encircled by dual dashed white lines, subtly emphasizing focus. The background features a rich radial gradient transitioning from violet to deep indigo, decorated with varied geometric accents for a dynamic visual flow. The headline (id: "heading") uses bold white text, while the subheading (id: "subheading") pops in golden yellow. A soft italic tagline (id: "tagline") completes the intro trifecta. The price (id: "price") sits in a bright yellow orb, drawing immediate attention. Supporting features are listed below (id: "description") and a vivid yellow CTA button (id: "cta") is placed at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #8E43F0 → #6A3DE8 → #5524D0  
- Accent Yellow: #FFD166, #FFC107  
- Text White: #FFFFFF  
- Price Text Purple: #5524D0
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of headphones in an elegant, soft beige tone that gives a premium and minimalist appearance. The main color palette revolves around a warm cream (#F5EFE5), complemented by subtle shadows of light taupe (#DCD4CA) and highlights in off-white (#FAF9F6). These colors blend harmoniously with smooth gradients and soft lighting that accentuate the curves and contours of the headphones, making the product appear both sleek and comfortable. For an advertisement banner, using these tones together with a contrast hue like muted gold (#CBBFA0) can enhance the modern, sophisticated look and appeal to a luxury-conscious audience.
